## SbEmitterMetadataOptions.clientId property

The unique id of the client that this emitter should use as the underlying emitter. This should match the client name defined in `SgClientOptions.name`<!-- -->.

By default `SgClientOptions.name` is not set, which is the identifier for the default client. A multi-client environment is not required in most of the scenarios, if that is the case do not set this value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
clientId?: string;
```
